inclusion.criterion: urinary retention due to obstructive benign prostatic hyperplasia
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: indwelling urinary catheter for at least 1 month
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: at least one failure of a trial without catheter despite alpha-blocker treatment for at least 72 hours
inclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of BPH and multiple urological procedures, including suprapubic prostatectomy. He currently has an indwelling urinary catheter due to severe urethral stricture.
